name: Motion Traxx
tag_list: digital-media, mobile, fitness, workout, freemium, health, wellness, training, running, fitness-music, deekron
overview:
Motion Traxx is a digital audio service for exercisers.

The company streams specially designed workout music and trainer-led audio tracks that are designed to help the listener get fitter, faster.

Audio tracks are designed to motivate and pace the listener while running, spinning, using cardio machines, power walking and doing other workouts.

Scientific studies show that using the right music during exercise can enhance a workout by up to 46%.

Motion Traxx creates music that enhances the exerciser’s performance. It achieves this through an exclusive music production technique developed by Deekron ‘The Fitness DJ’ called Action Sync(TM), which syncs the Pace, Power and Flow of the music to the needs of the listener’s workout.

Using Motion Traxx has been proven to help the listener push longer, harder and faster than exercising with ordinary music, or no music at all. Tens of thousands use Motion Traxx regularly to achieve their fitness goals, including losing weight, getting fitter or training for marathons.
